resources.string: A key rapped by black paper around Starbucks at Pioneer Square Portland
In the library of this university, there is a 3D printing section. Find a printed object that it\'s not a Creature
In a nice Sunny day, where do people enjoy their coffee near the Starbucks?
You have a key in hand, think about itâ€¦
Now, lets go to the greatest university in Oregon. Think about three letters
Rule1: DO NOT crack this app to get the location You will ruin all the fun and your efforts.
Rule2: You can take any transportation tool to reach the destination.
Rule3: Once you found the clue, please stay within 3 meters to let the app clear the clue for you.
Now you have a photo of a lighthouse. Go to the west coast in Oregon. You won\'t miss it.
